body_content.explanation: work that is done as a preparation for work that will be done later:
examples: The committee will meet today to lay the groundwork for inter-party talks next month.
The groundwork for the book stalled soon after it began.

body_content.explanation: the first part of building work, in which existing buildings, trees, etc. are removed and the surface of the ground is prepared:
examples: Costing 200 million pounds, groundwork began on the site in February.
Some building projects never get beyond foundation stage because the groundworks swallow the entire budget.
